create a .csv(excel) sheet file in which you have to add 50 mock user records with below fields as dummy data
while adding make sure few fields data values are missing not the keys only values, Now Create a service to post all the data from csv to your database in json format(csv upload through API), and make sure the validations should work properly if the fields are valid should insert if any field is missing that specific record should not be inserted and should through error stating this specific fields are missing 
Finally in your response it should show count of records inserted successfully and count of records failed. Z
while inserting from csv to api it should process all users in csv file not a specific record
